title: panic in SetModTime
body:
<!--

Welcome :-) We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

If you've just got a question or aren't sure if you've found a bug then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

instead of filing an issue for a quick response.

If you think you might have found a bug, please can you try to replicate it with the latest beta?

    https://beta.rclone.org/
    
If you can still replicate it with the latest beta, then please fill in the info below which makes our lives much easier.  A log with -vv will make our day :-)

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?
I'm hitting this panic often when trying to copy a large number of files from a local EBS vol to s3

```
panic: assignment to entry in nil map

goroutine 40 [running]:
github.com/rclone/rclone/backend/s3.(*Object).SetModTime(0xc002689570, 0x1e08a80, 0xc0000bc3c0, 0x0, 0xed4f3cc54, 0x2acf240, 0x1, 0x1)
        /home/ec2-user/rclone/backend/s3/s3.go:1919 +0x111
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations.equal(0x1e08a80, 0xc0000bc3c0, 0x7f527360f038, 0xc0031ac360, 0x1e176c0, 0xc002689570, 0x10000, 0x7f527360f038)
        /home/ec2-user/rclone/fs/operations/operations.go:221 +0x5e9
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations.Equal(0x1e08a80, 0xc0000bc3c0, 0x7f527360f038, 0xc0031ac360, 0x1e176c0, 0xc002689570, 0xc0060c0090)
        /home/ec2-user/rclone/fs/operations/operations.go:117 +0x88
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/operations.NeedTransfer(0x1e08a80, 0xc0000bc3c0, 0x1e176c0, 0xc002689570, 0x1e16dc0, 0xc0031ac360, 0x1e16dc0)
        /home/ec2-user/rclone/fs/operations/operations.go:1564 +0x72a
github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/sync.(*syncCopyMove).pairChecker(0xc000554000, 0xc0000bc240, 0xc0000bc280, 0xc0005540c0)
        /home/ec2-user/rclone/fs/sync/sync.go:226 +0x2e3
created by github.com/rclone/rclone/fs/sync.(*syncCopyMove).startCheckers
        /home/ec2-user/rclone/fs/sync/sync.go:307 +0x9a
```

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

Latest code from master branch

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (eg Windows 7, 64 bit)

Amazon Linux 2

####  Which cloud storage system are you using? (eg Google Drive)

Local file system to aws S3

#### The command you were trying to run (eg `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

rclone copy /XXXXX/XXXXX s3:XXXXX/XXXXX/ --progress
